section.p: The seven fools are building a fence around a tree where a cuckoo is nesting. When you ask why, their explanation is that the song of the cuckoo tells them it is time to start sowing the crops. ‘If we keep the cuckoo penned up all year, we’ll be able to get in two or even three harvests, won’t we?’
Just as he says that, the cuckoo flies off.
The seven fools scratch their heads. ‘We’ll have to build it higher next year,’ says one.
‘Maybe we could get a grappling hook up on to a cloud...’ suggests another, but by this time you are sauntering away shaking your head. .
